summary: WHILE DRIVING AT ANY SPEED UP HILL AND WITH NO WARNING THE TRANSMISSION  DECELERATED EVEN WHEN THE CONSUMER'S FOOT WAS ON THE ACCELERATOR AND IT WAS DIFFICULT FOR THE CONSUMER TO CONTROL THE VEHICLE. DEALER NOTIFIED.  *AK   THE TRANSMISSION LEAKED FLUID AND  BARELY MOVED.  THE DEALER REPLACED THE TRANSMISSION DRIVE ASSEMBLY AND THE EXTENSION HOUSING.  THE TRANSMISSION SLIPPED AND SLAMMED INTO GEAR.  THE DEALER REPLACED THE TRANSMISSION AGAIN. *SCC  *JB
